column4: anyone willing to help from changing settings of sound in ubuntu?

I have sound card integrated on motherboard.  My jack where sound goes out is dead so i have to use another jack for sending sound on speakers. This works fine with realtek HD settings in  Windows 7, but i don't know how to fix that in ubuntu...any idea?
alsamixer   #Look to see what channels may be muted or turned down.
cannot figure out how to declare that specific jack is for sound out...any suggestion except alsa mixer?
